thread.title: Throwback Thursday quiz: Can you identify these Portland area locations? (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: Throwback Thursday quiz: Can you identify these Portland area locations? (PHOTOS) | OregonLive.com

author: Joseph Rose | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Throwback Thursday quiz: Can you identify these Portland area locations? (PHOTOS)
text:
Here at Vintage Oregon, we're listening to U2's classic 1988 album "Rattle and Hum." There's this great lyric in the song "God Part II": "You glorify the past when the future dries up."
We certainly don't think the future has dried up. But we'd like to have some fun with the past, keeping in mind that it can be hard to know where you're going if you don't know where you've been.
That may be a Quote: from a Bill and Ted movie . It's hard to remember and we don't want to Google it. (WYLD STALLYNS!)
But we digress. Today, Vintage Oregon starts a new historical quiz that challenges readers to guess the present-day locations of photos from the Portland area's past. We're talking decades and decades before the dual monstrosities of the Portland Building and Bono prancing around in gaudy, ever-present shades .
In the coming months, we'll offer up new quizzes with new locations.
Have fun.
And may you never glorify the past because the future has dried up.
